channel.title: Comments on: WordCamp Utah Schedule is Now Up and New Sponsor

item.title: By: William
item.dc:creator: William
item.description: Thank you Joseph for sharing this information. The video link by Ash was very helpful. Thank you Ash
item.content:encoded: Thank you Joseph for sharing this information. The video link by Ash was very helpful. Thank you Ash

item.title: By: Ash
item.dc:creator: Ash
item.description:
Hey Joseph,
Just a quick note about the online videos from WordCamp Utah 2008:
You can watch all the videos online at:
<a href="http://is.gd/3is1" rel="nofollow">http://is.gd/3is1</a>
item.content:encoded:
Hey Joseph,

Just a quick note about the online videos from WordCamp Utah 2008:

item.title: By: Stefan
item.dc:creator: Stefan
item.description: "WordPress As A CMS" and "Good vs. Great Design" are very interesting topics. I hope we will have same topics at the next barcamp in germany!
item.content:encoded: “WordPress As A CMS” and “Good vs. Great Design” are very interesting topics. I hope we will have same topics at the next barcamp in germany!
